svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.11; rv:61.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/61.0" version="9.0.6" editor="www.draw.io" type="github"><diagram id="26bf4ef1-ba10-35ce-f7a6-efd4c3da6605" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Fira Code; color: rgb(0, 76, 153); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 253px; max-width: 579px; width: 577px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.div:
# List of Bruker OPUS files from Bruker NIR or mid-IR spectrometer
lf <- dir("data/spectra/soil-mir-examples", full.names = TRUE)
# Read spectra and metadata from OPUS files into a list in R
spc_list <- read_opus_univ(fnames = lf, extract = c("spc"))
## Spectral data processing pipe ===============================================
soilspec_tbl_eth <- spc_list %>%
# Convert nested list into tibble
gather_spc() %>%
# Standardize spectra to equal integer x unit intervals, 2cm^{-1} resolution
resample_spc(wn_lower = 500, wn_upper = 3996, wn_interval = 2) %>%
# Calculate mean spectra by `sample_id` column
average_spc(by = "sample_id") %>%
# Savitzky-Golay 1st derivative, window size of 21 points (2cm^{-1} * 21)
preprocess_spc(select = "sg_1_w21")

div.div:

<chr> <chr> <chr> <list>

# ... with 274 more rows, and 6 more variables: wavenumbers <list>, metadata <list>,
# spc_rs <list>, wavenumbers_rs <list>, spc_mean <list>, spc_pre <list>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Fira Code; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 233px; max-width: 534px; width: 533.571px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.div:
List of 3
 $ metadata   :'data.frame':    1 obs. of  10 variables:
  ..$ unique_id : Factor w/ 1 level "BF_lo_01_soil_cal.0_20160313": 1
  ..$ file_id        : Factor w/ 1 level "BF_lo_01_soil_cal.0": 1
  ..$ sample_id      : Factor w/ 1 level "BF_lo_01_soil_cal": 1
  ..$ rep_no         : Factor w/ 1 level "0": 1
  ..$ date_time      : POSIXct[1:1], format: "2016-03-13 17:53:16"
  ..$ sample_info    : Factor w/ 1 level "BF_lo_01_soil_cal": 1
  ..$ instrument_name: Factor w/ 1 level "alp-mir": 1
  ..$ resolution     : Factor w/ 1 level "4": 1
  ..$ bms            : Factor w/ 1 level "ZnSe": 1
  ..$ lwn            : Factor w/ 1 level "11603.418288": 1
 $ spc        : num [1, 1:2471] 0.000671 0.00067 0.000674 0.00068 0.000686 ...
  ..- attr(*, "dimnames")=List of 2
  .. ..$ : chr "BF_lo_01_soil_cal.0_20160313"
  .. ..$ : chr [1:2471] "3997.2" "3995.8" "3994.3" "3992.9" ...
 $ wavenumbers: num [1:2471] 3997 3996 3994 3993 3992 ...

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Monaco; color: rgb(0, 76, 153); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 68px; max-width: 249px; width: 217px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.div:
# Plot resampled spectra
# for all scan replicates
plot_spc(soilspec_tbl_eth,
y = "spc", by = "file_id")

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Monaco; color: rgb(0, 76, 153); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 63px; max-width: 265px; width: 260px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.div:
# Plot preprocessed spectra
# by sample_id
plot_spc(soilspec_tbl_eth,
y = "spc_pre", by = "sample_id")
